pages.text: The $(d)Iron Dropper$() is an upgrade to the regular Dropper, with a handful of extra features.$(br2)Inside its GUI are 4 buttons to change some settings.$(br2)Its redstone settings are:$(br)$(li)Eject when pulsed$(li)Eject while powered$(li)Eject always
pages.title: Iron Dropper

pages.text: You can cycle the items' pickup delay through 20, 5, and 0 ticks.$(br2)You can toggle if the items shoot straight forward or if they have slightly randomized velocity.$(br2)Finally, you can toggle whether it should make particles and sounds when ejecting items or not.
